Minecraft Librarian

A python program that returns in game item id's. Scans information from official Minecraft Wiki

Notable Features

  • Receives information from the Minecraft Wiki
  • Cache's the info scraped from the wiki
  • Searches using all words or any words
  • Order of search words does not affect results
